text: So may they revere you as long as they live on the land you gave our ancestors.
The sons of Ulam were warriors, skilled with the bow, and they had many sons and grandsons: one hundred and fifty. All these were the sons of Benjamin.
When Jesus returned, the crowd welcomed him, for they were all waiting for him.
But now you are trying to kill me, a man who has told you the truth that I heard from God; Abraham did not do this.
Philip came to Azotus, and went about proclaiming the good news to all the towns until he reached Caesarea.
